abstract: Mr. Dimon put the bank in a good position to avoid the worst of the financial crisis and to weather its aftermath.
snippet: Mr. Dimon put the bank in a good position to avoid the worst of the financial crisis and to weather its aftermath.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Dimon has generated his fair share of controversy as the boss of JPMorgan Chase. But he marks 10 years running the New York bank on Thursday having fashioned an institution with some of the leading results in the business — and in a strong position to outperform competitors for another decade.

headline.main: Jamie Dimon of JPMorgan Still Strong After 10 Years as Chief
